name: The Dan Game - Remastered!
description:
!!! CLICK THE GAME WINDOW FIRST, THEN HIT SPACE TO BEGIN !!!

THE DAN GAME

By Eric Ross

Story:

Our quest begins with our hero Dan, in search of his friend-in-need Dr. The James. Will he make it to the end and defeat his archenemy...or suffer a face worse than death at the hands of the evil girls? YOU WILL BE THE DECIDER!

Controls:

Up arrow - Jump or climb up vines.

Down arrow - Crouch or climb down vines.

Right arrow - Move Dan right.

Left Arrow - Move Dan left.

Space - Throw a baseball (if you have any).

Items:

Pizza Slice - Gives you and extra life (for a maximum of 4 total lives).

Baseball - Gives you 10 throw-able baseballs.

Money Bag - Worth 50 points each.

Baddies:

Walking Girl - The games basic enemy, she searches for Dan relentlessly, for the sole purpose of taking him to her leader.... Can be defeated by jumping on them or hitting them with a baseball.

Disgruntled NY Yankees Fan - Dan is a major Red Sox fan, the natural enemy of the Yankees. Equipped with jet gliders & baseball bats, they are ready to take out ever last Red Sox player & fan. Can only be defeated by baseballs.

The Boss....the evil floating Sondra head - The purist incarnation of feminine power...a giant fire breathing creature. It too can only be defeated by a baseball.
